alt: A modern bathroom vanity with a chevron wood pattern, gold hardware, and dual sinks beneath a large, backlit mirror. Tiled walls and floors, a towel hangs on a gold rack.
A bathroom with a wood paneled wall.

Modern bathroom with white subway tile, a bathtub-shower combo, gold fixtures, a vanity with a white countertop, a rectangular mirror, wall art, a towel, and a green plant in a vase. Bright and clean design.
Modern bathroom with a rectangular sink, dark vanity, glass-enclosed shower, beige tiles, and an illuminated mirror above the sink. RENOVA logo is visible in the bottom right corner.
Modern bathroom with a glass-enclosed shower featuring black fixtures and a large freestanding white bathtub, set against gray tiled walls and white floors.

Modern bathroom with a glass-enclosed shower on the left, light wood vanity with a white countertop and gold fixtures on the right, oval mirror above, and a doorway leading to a bright adjoining room.
Modern bathroom with a double-sink wooden vanity, two mirrors, gold fixtures, wall sconces, and a glass-enclosed walk-in shower with a rainfall shower head and a bench.
Modern bathroom with a spacious glass-enclosed shower, dark herringbone tile walls, gold fixtures, and a bathtub placed by two windows. A towel and decorative items sit on a stool by the tub.

Modern bathroom with a large soaking tub, glass-enclosed shower with gray tiles, double sinks with mirrors, and a large window letting in natural light. The space is bright and clean with white walls and minimal decor.
